title: A proposal about printing A treatise of algebra, historical and practical written by the Reverend and learned Dr. John Wallis (Savilian Professor of Geometry in the University of Oxford), containing not only a history, but an institution of algebra, according to several methods hitherto in practice; with many additions of his own.
author: Wallis, John, 1616-1703. Treatise of algebra, both historical and practical.
